package com.homeworkjava;

public class StringReverse {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		
		
		String s="automation";
		
		int length=s.length();
		
		String reverse="";
		
		for(int i=length-1;i>=0;i--)
		
			reverse=reverse+s.charAt(i);
		
		
			
		{
			
			System.out.println(reverse);
		}
		
	}

}
